news.title: Calgary Green Line Expansion Approved
news.excerpt: Alberta Transit has approved the next phase of the Green Line expansion, improving access to key communities across Calgary.

news.title: Public Transit Safety Measures
news.excerpt: New safety protocols have been implemented to enhance passenger security and comfort.

news.title: Edmonton LRT Service Changes
news.excerpt: Temporary schedule adjustments will affect several LRT routes as maintenance work continues through spring.
